channel.title: McDonalds
channel.description:
What's your opinion it?
Do you eat it?
Do you like the taste?
Do you hate it?
Mature Discussion Please.
In my opinion, McDonalds is the shittiest food I've ever seen in my life. It is really disgusting. One time when I was little I was feeling fine the whole day, refreshed, then I saw McDonalds. At that time I was little and didn't know what I was eating. Micky D's was my best friend. After eating a breakfast burrito I didn't feel good [b]AT ALL[/b] Eventually my mom had to stop the car because I was puking my guts out. I knew it was the Mc Donalds, I could feel it.
Also, why the fuck would anyone eat something that is one of the main causes of obesity, or brings: Heart disease, Hypertension, and High Blood Pressure. You would have to walk fucking seven hours straight just to burn that shit off.
Whats even worse is that they target little children with happy meals & Ronald McDonald. Honestly? It's enough to feed Adults/Teens, shit food, but then you have to target children too? Ever wonder why you see so much of those fat chubby kids that look like exercise balls?
I think I'm done.
What s you opinion?

item.title: McDonalds
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

You guys are raging about all these fast food chains targeting children and giving poor food, but the thing is it’s your choice to eat their… If you get sick, die, fat, dumb, hyperfucked, or even fat. It is your fault not the fast food chain. They don’t make you eat their, you choose to eat their.

I have to dis agree with some of you, most of the time when I ever eat out at a place like Md, or Burger King, I feel like crap after eating it, but it was my choice to eat it and I choose to keep eating it because it is filling, tasty, and above all it’s some thing to eat on the run…

Read full topic
